title: Monster Hunter World, Celeste Are Unbelievable - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.29.18
description:
Thanks to Me Undies for sponsoring this episode. Go to https://MeUndies.com/Morning and get 20% off a matching pairs of MeUndies for you and your partner

Thanks to Pro Flowers for sponsoring this episode. Go to https://ProFlowers.com and use promo code: KF

Greg returns and recaps Monster Hunter World's crazy sales and Celeste's amazing gameplay with Tim.

00:01:40 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:03:50 - Monster Hunter is Fire! Via IGN
00:15:00 - SEGA and Quantic Dream Alum, via IGN
00:19:50 - Rainbow Six Seige Reaction, via GameSpot
00:22:10 - PSN Problems, via Kotaku
00:20:15 - Elon Musk in Borderlands? Via GameSpot
00:24:15 - The official list of upcoming games
 Reader mail   -
00:29:33 - Rapid-fire Recap Greg! - Marco Hutchens
00:36:10 - What System are you playing Celeste on? - Albob875 (Alec Bobko)
00:40:40 - If this move makes Game Pass very successful, do you think Microsoft might move it's internal development into a more episodic size and release schedule? Taking a note from TellTale and releasing smaller components more frequently to keep the subscribers tied to the service and prevent the one month sub spike when a big release comes a month? - BrockARock
00:47:40 - Squad Up: Toni(PS3) - Tay_Skull
00:49:00 - Bad Switch Names: carlthewinner
00:49:25 - You‘re Wrong
00:51:00 - BREAKING NEWS: Microsoft may be looking into acquiring EA
Tomorrow’s host:Andrea

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
